properties.description: This dataflow transforms  raw hospital admission data

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcHospitalAdmissions
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LkpSrcCountry
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		day as string,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as string,
		week_of_month as string,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as string,
		year_week as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LkpSrcWeekData
SrcHospitalAdmissions select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		value,
		source,
		each(match(name=='date'),
			'reported_date' = $$),
		each(match(name=='year_week'),
			'reported_year_week' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequired
SelectRequired, LkpSrcCountry lookup(SelectRequired@country == LkpSrcCountry@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
LookupCountry split(indicator=='Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k'||indicator=='Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitDailyFromWeekly@(Weekly, Daily)
LkpSrcWeekData aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week = year + '-W' + lpad(week_of_year, 2, '0')),
	week_start_date = min(date),
		week_end_date = max(date)) ~> AggWeekDate
